description:
▸▸▸▸ As featured on Engadget, CNET, The Register and many more ▸▸▸▸

CoPilot GPS is the powerful free offline mapping, route planning and local exploring app from the developers of award-winning CoPilot Premium navigation.

+Now also optimised for iOS 8+

PLAN, EXPLORE & NAVIGATE 
Find the best way to all the places you need to go without relying on your mobile connection. Detailed street maps of an entire country or region are stored on your iPhone or iPad, so you’ll still be able to calculate routes and get driving or walking directions even when there’s no cell coverage. Millions of useful Points of Interest are built into the app, making it easy to locate nearby restaurants, stores, gas stations and more. You can also search for local businesses and attractions using Google™, Yelp and Wikipedia.

SAVE YOUR DATA
With CoPilot GPS there’s no need to burn through your mobile data plan by downloading maps, and you can navigate abroad stress free without worrying about huge data roaming charges.

KEY FEATURES:
► Premium quality 2D street maps stored on-board your iPhone for offline use
► Millions of Points of Interest (POIs) built in with in-app dialing
► Powerful route planning with a multi-stop trip optimizer
► Alternate Routes: CoPilot GPS provides up to 3 ways to your destination
► Drag and drop route editing
► Driving directions: manually cycle through the turns to your destination
► Walking mode: explore unfamiliar cities on foot with confidence
► Social sharing: let your friends know where you are with Twitter & Facebook status updates*
► Useful local content: discover interesting places and attractions nearby with Wikipedia, Yelp and Google Search*

IN-APP UPGRADE TO VOICE-GUIDED NAVIGATION
Upgrade to full CoPilot voice-guided, turn-by-turn navigation via in-app purchase, and enjoy: 3D map views, speed limit warnings, speedometer and realistic ClearTurn™ display with lane indicator arrows at complex interchanges.

AVAILABLE MAPS 
► Download any one of the following countries/regions for free: US + Canada, UK + Ireland, Balkans, BeNeLux, Russia, Central Eastern Europe, DACH (Germany, Austria, Switzerland), France, Greece, Iberia, Italy, Nordics, Poland, Romania, Turkey, Ukraine, Southern Africa (South Africa, Lesotho, Swaziland, Namibia and Botswana), Australia + New Zealand, Brasil, Middle East/GCC (Bahrain, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia and UAE).
South East Asia: Brunei, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, Taiwan and Thailand 
NEW: India

(قم بالملاحة في الشرق الأوسط بدون إستهلاك البيانات (موبايل انترنت) - بإمكانك تخزين خرائط الدول التالية على الجوال الخاص بك: البحرين، الأردن، الكويت، لبنان، عمان، قطر، السعودية و الإمارات. )

► Traveling abroad? You can add extra countries and regions through in-app purchase.

IMPORTANT NOTE ABOUT WIFI IPADS: CoPilot GPS runs on iPhone and 3G/4G iPads. It can also be installed on WiFi iPads, but for trip planning features only (WiFi iPads do not have a GPS receiver for location)

NOTES:
► Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life

► *Social sharing, Google, Yelp and Wikipedia requires a mobile connection
For more information, visit copilotgps.com

Stay Connected with CoPilot 
EMEA: Follow us on Twitter @copilotlive or Like us on facebook.com/copilotlive
Google+: search +copilot

USA & Canada: Follow us on Twitter @copilotlive_us or Like us facebook.com/copilotliveusa
trackCensoredName: CoPilot™ GPS – Plan & explore with offline maps & directions
trackName: CoPilot™ GPS – Plan & explore with offline maps & directions
releaseNotes:
• Already upgraded to full turn-by-turn navigation? Find the best way with the least delay: get 30% off ActiveTraffic until 30 November 2014. MyCopilot -> Features & Upgrades
• Map update of Europe and North America bringing enhancements and fixes for reported errors. To download go to:   MyCoPilot > My Maps.  Map update is only available if the maps are currently downloaded.
• Improved graphics for iPhone 6 
• Now also supports iOS 8
• Central Eastern Europe map region is available to download again
• Iceland is back in Nordics region
• Includes a few minor fixes here and there
